annotations.description: This game has surely entertained the crowd. We saw a lot of wonderful movement and opportunities on the pitch. The visitors certainly had the better of things. Both sides adopted slow build up play tactics today.

annotations.label: whistle

annotations.label: whistle

Not a lot happening in the first half, it hasn't been the best game so far in terms of quality. Neither side has gained the upper hand as yet. The home side are attempting to hold onto the ball for as long as possible. The away team, on the other hand, are playing long ball football.

annotations.label: whistle
